sub_title: Consulent Inburgering & Participatie at Gemeente Den Haag
summary:
EDUCATION:
- HAVO (profile Economy & Society);
- HBO Management Economy and Rights;
- University, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam, Premaster and Master Business Administration;

OPTIONAL MODULES HBO:
- Diversity management (knowledge of the diverse set of Dutch society, diverse cultures in the Netherlands and its impact on business and communication processes).
- Consumer rights (knowledge of the main topics of the consumer and developing skills to practical questions in the consumer field).
- Introduction to the criminal law (knowledge in the field of fraud and criminal conduct).
- German and digital Training and Assessment Academic English Reading.

SCHOOL ACTIVITIES:
- Students board MER (evaluate and advise on courses in the training, teachers, exams etc.).
- MER Business Club (the organization of activities such as workshops, lectures, company visits and other activities to widen the horizon of the work opportunities of the MER students).
- Internal Audit MER.

WORKING EXPERIENCE:
- Administrative Support Assistent, Laakkwartier Library, Agency, Vedior.
- Cashier, Albert Heijn.
- Call force for various activities, Agency Studenttalent.
- Internship (assessment 80), graduation (80 +90 = final grade 83).
- CSE ENGI-assistant at Siemens Nederland N.V. in the division ‘Customer Services Engineering’ under the heading ‘Engineering & Commissioning’, (activities in the field of relationship development between the Sales divisions and the Support department CSE ENGI. Also organizing a day to develop the relationship and the communication between the departments. Additional works at One ENGI like 3i and innovation).

OTHER KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS:  
- Languages: English, Turkish, Arabic, (French and German at HAVO level).
- Computer: Microsoft Office, MAVIM (system for process view) and SPSS (system to introduce survey data).

Specialties: Communnication, relationship management, innovation, project support, management consulting, Internal Customer Satisfaction Survey, organizing events, reporting, research etc.

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

Activities: In the field of relationship development between the Sales
divisions and the Support department CSE ENGI. Also organizing a day to develop the relationship and the communication between the departments. Additional works at One ENGI. Work in the
field of 3i and innovation.
profile_positions.title: Communication and innovation assistant
